  • Method Details

    • loadTexture

      void loadTexture(Texture texture)
      Loads a texture into memory.
      Parameters:
      texture - The texture to load.

    • unloadTexture

      void unloadTexture(Texture texture)
      Unloads the texture from memory
      Parameters:
      texture - The texture to unload.

    • unloadAllTextures

      void unloadAllTextures()
      Unloads all textures from memory

    • clearTexture

      void clearTexture(Texture texture)
      Clears the specified texture.
      Parameters:
      texture - The texture to clear.

    • loadFont

      void loadFont(String saveName, String fontName, float fontSize, int fontStyle)
      Loads a font from the file system and saves it to the font cache
      Parameters:
      saveName - The name you want to save the font as.
      fontName - The name of the font you want to load.
      fontSize - The size of the font.
      fontStyle - Font.PLAIN, Font.BOLD, Font.ITALIC, Font.BOLD and Font. ITALIC

    • loadFont

      void loadFont(String fontName, float size, float sizeToLoad, int fontFormat, RelativeFile relativeFile)
      Loads a font from a file
      Parameters:
      fontName - The name of the font.
      size - The size of the font you want to load.
      sizeToLoad - The size of the font to load.
      fontFormat - 0 = Bitmap, 1 = Vector
      relativeFile - The file to load the font from.

    • unloadFont

      void unloadFont(String fontName)
      Unloads a font from memory
      Parameters:
      fontName - The name of the font to unload.

    • getTextureColors

      Color[][] getTextureColors(Texture texture)
      It returns a 2D array of colors that represent the colors of the pixels in the texture
      Parameters:
      texture - The texture to get the colors from.
      Returns:
      A 2D array of Color objects.

    • setTextureColors

      void setTextureColors(Texture texture, Color[][] colors)
      It takes a texture and a 2D array of colors, and sets the colors of the texture to the colors in the array
      Parameters:
      texture - The texture to set the colors of.
      colors - The colors to set the texture to.

    • setPixel

      void setPixel(Texture texture, Color color, Vector2 position)
      Set the pixel at the given position in the given texture to the given color.
      Parameters:
      texture - The texture to draw to.
      color - The color of the pixel.
      position - The position of the pixel to set.

    • cutTexture

      Texture cutTexture(Texture texture, int x, int y, int width, int height)
      It cuts a part of a texture and returns it as a new texture
      Parameters:
      texture - The texture to cut from.
      x - The x coordinate of the top left corner of the texture to cut out.
      y - The y coordinate of the top left corner of the texture to cut out.
      width - The width of the texture to be cut.
      height - The height of the texture to be cut.
      Returns:
      A texture.

    • duplicate

      Texture duplicate(Texture texture)
      Duplicate the given texture.
      Parameters:
      texture - The texture to duplicate.
      Returns:
      A new texture object that is a duplicate of the texture object passed in.

    • overlayTexture

      Texture overlayTexture(Texture tex1, Texture tex2, Vector2 pos1, Vector2 pos2)
      It takes two textures and overlays them on top of each other.
      Parameters:
      tex1 - The first texture to be overlayed.
      tex2 - The texture that will be overlayed on top of tex1.
      pos1 - The position of the first texture.
      pos2 - The position of the second texture.
      Returns:
      A new texture.

    • scaleTexture

      Texture scaleTexture(Texture texture, int width, int height)
      It takes a texture and returns a new texture that is a scaled version of the original
      Parameters:
      texture - The texture to scale.
      width - The width of the new texture.
      height - The height of the new texture.
      Returns:
      A texture.

    • getTextureWidth

      int getTextureWidth(int textureId)
      Returns the width of the texture with the given ID
      Parameters:
      textureId - The id of the texture to get the width of.
      Returns:
      The width of the texture.

    • getTextureHeight

      int getTextureHeight(int textureId)
      Returns the height of the texture with the given ID
      Parameters:
      textureId - The id of the texture to get the width of.
      Returns:
      The height of the texture.
